SEARCH
Module org.example.game
Package entity

Class NPC

java.lang.Object
entity.NPC
public class NPC extends Object
Represents a non-player character (NPC) in the game world.

NPCs display a simple idle animation and can engage in dialogue when the player interacts within range.

  • Constructor Summary

    NPC(double x, double y, String[] dialog)
    Loads NPC frames and initializes position and dialogue.

  • Constructor Details

    • NPC

      public NPC(double x, double y, String[] dialog)
      Loads NPC frames and initializes position and dialogue.
      Parameters:
      x - the world x-coordinate of the NPC's origin
      y - the world y-coordinate of the NPC's origin
      dialog - array of dialogue lines to display on interaction
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an animation frame resource is missing

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(double dt, World world)
      Advances the NPC animation based on elapsed time.

      Should be called each frame from the game loop.

      Parameters:
      dt - time elapsed since last update in seconds
      world - the world context (unused in current implementation)

    • interact

      public void interact(double playerX, double playerY)
      Handles player interaction, toggling or advancing dialogue if within range.

      If the player is close enough, opens dialogue or shows next line.

      Parameters:
      playerX - the player's world x-coordinate (center)
      playerY - the player's world y-coordinate (center)

    • isInDialog

      public boolean isInDialog()
      Indicates whether the NPC is currently in dialogue mode.
      Returns:
      true if a dialogue box should be displayed, false otherwise

    • currentDialogLine

      public String currentDialogLine()
      Retrieves the current line of dialogue.

      Returns an empty string if not in dialogue.

      Returns:
      the current dialogue line or empty string

    • render

      public void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, Camera cam)
      Renders the NPC to the screen with current animation frame.

      Applies a vertical offset so NPC sprite appears grounded.

      Parameters:
      gc - the graphics context for drawing
      cam - the camera providing world-to-screen translation
